name: Peel Off Base Coat
description:
For the easiest, non-damaging removal of your gel manicure, start with our Peel Off Base Coat. Formulated with hydrating glycerin to treat your nails while you wear it.
For use with gel: After applying Peel Off Base Coat, you must apply Gel Base Coat and cure.
Can also be used with Long-Lasting and Quick Dry polish for peel-off removal without nail polish remover.

name: Gel Base Coat
description:
The essential prep step for maximum gel polish staying power. The perfect base coat for up to 21 days of gel bliss.
• Shiny and plump gel
• Lasts up to 21 days
• Drama-free non-damaging removal

name: Amethyst Velvet
description:
A pretty pastel lavender magnetic gel polish that’s perfectly purple.

“Lavender has always been our go-to new neutral. It needed to be velvet!” XO SGT

How to create effects:
Velvet Effect: Wave the rectangular side of the wand over each nail for an all-over shimmering velvet effect.

Cateye Effect: Place your finger over the rectangular side of the magnet while you paint

French Tip: Place your finger over the magnet while you paint the top with magnetic polish.

Circle Effect: Hold the circular end of the magnet over your nail immediately after painting

• Shiny and plump gel
• Lasts up to 21 days
• Drama-free non-damaging removal
